title: Capital Flight Surge Weighs on Thailand’s Battered Stock Market
description: Thailand is witnessing a growing wave of capital flight as domestic investors move more funds overseas, adding fresh pressure on Asia’s worst-performing equity market this year.
content: Thailand is witnessing a growing wave of capital flight as domestic investors move more funds overseas, adding fresh pressure on Asia’s worst-performing equity market this year.
